The scene suggests preparation for an activity involving the cherry tomatoes and the substances in the box. 

Given the setup, it is likely that the man will dip the cherry tomatoes into one of the substances. However, the dense caption does not provide explicit details about the number of times the cherry tomatoes are dipped.
